entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening then light after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10. POP 70%
